title: 'Boys and Girl - Cooper Rush vs. Garrett Gilbert QB Competition; Week 9 Steelers Preview with NFL Network's Aditi Kinkhabwala
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Cooper Rush vs. Garrett Gilbert QB Competition; Week 9 Steelers Preview with NFL Network's Aditi Kinkhabwala
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby talk about the Cowboys’ quarterback competition. Will it be Cooper Rush or Garrett Gilbert? Plus, NFL Network’s Aditi Kinkhabwala stops by to preview the Steelers' side of things ahead of Sunday’s game. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
